025
026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets.snippet;
027
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.List;
030
031import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Resources;
032
033//
034// markup-comment = { markup-tag } [":"] ;
035//     markup-tag = "@" , tag-name , {attribute} ;
036//
037
038/**
039 * A parser of a markup line.
040 */
041public final class MarkupParser {
042
043    private static final int EOI = 0x1A;
044    private char[] buf;
045    private int bp;
046    private int buflen;
047    private char ch;
048
049    private final Resources resources;
050
051    public MarkupParser(Resources resources) {
052        this.resources = resources;
053    }
054
055    public List<Parser.Tag> parse(String input) throws ParseException {
056
057        // No vertical whitespace
058        assert input.codePoints().noneMatch(c -> c == '\n' || c == '\r');
059
060        buf = new char[input.length() + 1];
061        input.getChars(0, input.length(), buf, 0);
062        buf[buf.length - 1] = EOI;
063        buflen = buf.length - 1;
064        bp = -1;
065
066        nextChar();
067        return parse();
068    }
069
070    protected List<Parser.Tag> parse() throws ParseException {
071        List<Parser.Tag> tags = readTags();
072        if (ch == ':') {
073            tags.forEach(t -> t.appliesToNextLine = true);
074            nextChar();
075        }
076        skipWhitespace();
077        if (ch != EOI) {
078            return List.of();
079        }
080        return tags;
081    }
082
083    protected List<Parser.Tag> readTags() throws ParseException {
084        List<Parser.Tag> tags = new ArrayList<>();
085        skipWhitespace();
086        while (bp < buflen) {
087            if (ch == '@') {
088                tags.add(readTag());
089            } else {
090                break;
091            }
092        }
093        return tags;
094    }
095
096    protected Parser.Tag readTag() throws ParseException {
097        nextChar();
098        final int nameBp = bp;
099        String name = readIdentifier();
100        skipWhitespace();
101
102        List<Attribute> attributes = attrs();
103        skipWhitespace();
104
105        Parser.Tag i = new Parser.Tag();
106        i.nameLineOffset = nameBp;
107        i.name = name;
108        i.attributes = attributes;
109
110        return i;
111    }
112
113    protected String readIdentifier() {
114        int start = bp;
115        nextChar();
116        while (bp < buflen
117            && (Character.isUnicodeIdentifierPart(ch) || ch == '-')) {
118            nextChar();
119        }
120        return new String(buf, start, bp - start);
121    }
122
123    protected void skipWhitespace() {
124        while (bp < buflen && Character.isWhitespace(ch)) {
125            nextChar();
126        }
127    }
128
129    void nextChar() {
130        ch = buf[bp < buflen ? ++bp : buflen];
131    }
132
133    // Parsing machinery is adapted from
134    // com.sun.tools.javac.parser.DocCommentParser:
135
136    private enum ValueKind {
137        EMPTY,
138        UNQUOTED,
139        SINGLE_QUOTED,
140        DOUBLE_QUOTED;
141    }
142
143    protected List<Attribute> attrs() throws ParseException {
144        List<Attribute> attrs = new ArrayList<>();
145        skipWhitespace();
146
147        while (bp < buflen && isIdentifierStart(ch)) {
148            int nameStartPos = bp;
149            String name = readAttributeName();
150            skipWhitespace();
151            StringBuilder value = new StringBuilder();
152            var vkind = ValueKind.EMPTY;
153            int valueStartPos = -1;
154            if (ch == '=') {
155                nextChar();
156                skipWhitespace();
157                if (ch == '\'' || ch == '"') {
158                    vkind = (ch == '\'') ? ValueKind.SINGLE_QUOTED
159                        : ValueKind.DOUBLE_QUOTED;
160                    char quote = ch;
161                    nextChar();
162                    valueStartPos = bp;
163                    while (bp < buflen && ch != quote) {
164                        nextChar();
165                    }
166                    if (bp >= buflen) {
167                        String message = resources.getText(
168                            "doclet.snippet.markup.attribute.value.unterminated");
169                        throw new ParseException(() -> message, bp - 1);
170                    }
171                    addPendingText(value, valueStartPos, bp - 1);
172                    nextChar();
173                } else {
174                    vkind = ValueKind.UNQUOTED;
175                    valueStartPos = bp;
176                    while (bp < buflen && !isUnquotedAttrValueTerminator(ch)) {
177                        nextChar();
178                    }
179                    // Unlike the case with a quoted value, there's no need to
180                    // check for unexpected EOL here; an EOL would simply mean
181                    // "end of unquoted value".
182                    addPendingText(value, valueStartPos, bp - 1);
183                }
184                skipWhitespace();
185            }
186
187            // material implication:
188            // if vkind != EMPTY then it must be the case that valueStartPos >=0
189            assert !(vkind != ValueKind.EMPTY && valueStartPos < 0);
190
191            var attribute = vkind == ValueKind.EMPTY
192                ? new Attribute.Valueless(name, nameStartPos)
193                : new Attribute.Valued(name, value.toString(), nameStartPos,
194                    valueStartPos);
195
196            attrs.add(attribute);
197        }
198        return attrs;
199    }
200
201    protected boolean isIdentifierStart(char ch) {
202        return Character.isUnicodeIdentifierStart(ch);
203    }
204
205    protected String readAttributeName() {
206        int start = bp;
207        nextChar();
208        while (bp < buflen
209            && (Character.isUnicodeIdentifierPart(ch) || ch == '-'))
210            nextChar();
211        return new String(buf, start, bp - start);
212    }
213
214    // Similar to https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/syntax.html#unquoted
215    protected boolean isUnquotedAttrValueTerminator(char ch) {
216        switch (ch) {
217        case ':': // indicates that the instruction relates to the next line
218        case ' ':
219        case '\t':
220        case '"':
221        case '\'':
222        case '`':
223        case '=':
224        case '<':
225        case '>':
226            return true;
227        default:
228            return false;
229        }
230    }
231
232    protected void addPendingText(StringBuilder b, int textStart, int textEnd) {
233        if (textStart != -1) {
234            if (textStart <= textEnd) {
235                b.append(buf, textStart, (textEnd - textStart) + 1);
236            }
237        }
238    }
239}
